item.title: Powell Probe Is Another Blow to Fed Independence, Scope Says
item.description: The Trump administration’s new legal assault on the Federal Reserve further threatens independence and makes it harder for the central bank’s next chief to do their job, according to Scope Ratings.

item.title: Lebanon Bonds Rally to 2020 High on Hopes Over Banking Law
item.description: Lebanese bonds have rallied to the highest since March 2020, when the country defaulted on some $30 billion of international debt, on optimism that a proposed law to free up bank deposits is a positive step to improving the nation’s financial troubles.

item.title: MacKay Looks to Long-Dated Munis Ignored by Key Retail Investors
item.description: US state and local debt with long maturities offer “compelling” value in this less crowded corner of the market, according to the municipal investment arm of MacKay Shields.

item.title: Meta Taps Former Trump Adviser for New Role Driving AI Buildout
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. has appointed a former top adviser to US President Donald Trump to a newly created senior management role focused on partnering with governments and investors on AI.

item.title: DV Commodities Hires Quant Nicky Ferguson in Continued Expansion
item.description: DV Group hired Nicky Ferguson, a well-known quantitative analyst and trader in commodity markets, as the company continued to expand its trading capabilities.

item.title: Rare-Earth Miner Meteoric Seeks Partnership for Brazil Project
item.description: Meteoric Resources NL is casting a wide net including courting potential backers in Saudi Arabia as it pursues a strategic partner for its rare-earth mining project in Brazil.

item.title: Wall Street Reboots Leverage in $153 Billion Active Stock Trades
item.description: Even in the most vanilla corners of institutional money management, an appetite for leverage is quietly returning.

item.title: Congo Sending First Copper to US Under Mercuria-Backed Venture
item.description: The Democratic Republic of Congo is sending its first shipment of copper to the US through a partnership with Mercuria Energy Group Ltd., as the Trump administration pushes to challenge China’s dominance in supplies of key metals.

item.title: 多伦多道明银行计划推出与50亿美元企业贷款挂钩的证券化贷款工具
item.description: 多伦多道明银行正评估投资者对一项重大风险转移的兴趣，该交易涉及约50亿美元的企业贷款组合。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is gauging demand from investors for a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of about $5 billion of corporate loans.】

item.title: 必和必拓在自身掀起的铜业并购狂潮中沦为局外人
item.description: 必和必拓集团2024年收购竞争对手英美资源集团的豪赌，本应使其成为铜业繁荣的最大赢家——这场繁荣正是该集团长期预见的。两年后，铜市确实呈现繁荣景象。然而，这家全球最大矿业巨头却只能眼睁睁看着自己掀起的并购狂潮在旁观望。【原文：BHP Group’s bold bid to buy rival Anglo American Plc in 2024 was supposed to set it up as the clear winner in a copper boom it had long predicted. Two years later, the copper market is indeed booming. And yet the world’s biggest miner is left sitting on the sidelines of an M&A frenzy it began.】

item.title: 为何油价对伊朗和委内瑞拉动荡置若罔闻
item.description: 迄今为止，石油市场对2026年初爆发的剧烈地缘政治事件未受影响。【原文：Oil has so far shrugged off the dramatic geopolitical events that began 2026.】

item.title: 中国最畅销应用竟是帮奶奶签到的小工具
item.description: 欢迎阅读《科技深度》——彭博社全球记者团队每日为您带来的科技商业资讯。今日，弗拉德·萨沃夫将带您了解中国排名第一的付费应用。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov looks at China’s No.1 paid app.】

item.title: 汉莎航空计划重启伊朗航线，尽管该国爆发致命抗议活动
item.description: 尽管伊朗各地持续爆发致命抗议活动，且德国政府发布旅行警告，德国汉莎航空公司仍计划本周恢复飞往伊朗首都的航班。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG still plans to resume flights to Iran’s capital this week despite ongoing deadly protests around the country and German government travel warnings.】

item.title: 我研究过民主制度如何走向衰败。以下是我对特朗普现象的统一理论
item.description: 从加征关税到推翻外国领导人，存在一条贯穿始终的线索。这一切都关乎扩大总统的权力。【原文：There’s a through line that runs from tariffs to toppling a foreign leader. It’s all about expanding the power of the presidency.】

item.title: 当美国吸引投资回流之际，中国正向全球撒钱
item.description: 随着美国战略收缩，中国正再度向全球分散资本，促使世界其他国家面对与两大超级大国经济关系发生根本性转变的局面。【原文：As the US draws back, China is again dispersing capital globally, leading the rest of the world to confront a fundamental change in their economic relationships with both superpowers.】

item.title: 唐罗理论将如何在全球经济变迁中陷入两难境地
item.description: 中国资本外流加速，欧洲仍在坚持推进自由贸易【原文：China’s capital outflows are accelerating, and Europe is soldiering on with free trade】

item.title: 特朗普政府入股关键矿产企业ATALCO
item.description: 特朗普政府正斥资1.5亿美元入股，以建立美国唯一一家大型镓生产商。镓是一种关键矿物，广泛应用于卫星系统和军事雷达领域。【原文：The Trump administration is taking a $150 million equity stake to build the US’s only big producer of gallium, a critical mineral used in satellite systems and military radar.】

item.title: 德勤律师事务所任命德鲁为加拿大区负责人，目标实现进一步增长
item.description: 德勤律师事务所任命罗素·德鲁为加拿大区管理合伙人，将这位资深交易律师推上领导岗位，负责引领该所在日益受跨境交易影响的市场中实现业务增长。【原文：DLA Piper has named Russel Drew as its managing partner in Canada, handing the veteran deal lawyer the task of leading the firm’s growth in a market that’s increasingly being shaped by cross-border transactions.】

item.title: 英国通信管理局正式调查马斯克旗下X平台，此前该平台因Grok事件引发强烈抗议
item.description: 英国通信监管机构已对埃隆·马斯克旗下的社交媒体平台X展开正式调查，此举加剧了全球对利用人工智能工具Grok生成性暗示图像的强烈抵制。【原文：The UK communications regulator has opened a formal probe into Elon Musk’s social media site X, adding to the global backlash against sexually suggestive images generated using artificial intelligence tool Grok.】

item.title: 印度国有电力金融公司计划发行5.55亿美元零售债券
item.description: 印度电力金融公司——该国电力行业最大的贷款机构——计划向个人投资者发售债券，时隔两年多后重返零售市场。【原文：India’s Power Finance Corp., the country’s largest lender to the power sector, plans to sell bonds to individual investors, making a return to the retail market after a gap of more than two years.】

item.title: 据称渣打银行正筹备加密货币业务扩张，将推出主经纪商服务
item.description: 知情人士透露，渣打集团计划设立加密货币交易的顶级经纪业务，全球银行正加紧在数字资产领域展开竞争。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc plans to set up a prime brokerage for crypto trading, people with knowledge of the matter said, as global banks step up efforts to compete in digital assets.】

item.title: 当企业想要转型为银行时，他们会联系这些公司
item.description:
在特朗普执政期间，金融公司正争相获取美国银行牌照，其中至少有十余家获得了克拉罗斯集团的咨询服务。

【原文：

Financial firms are racing to secure US bank charters during Trump’s presidency, with Klaros Group advising at least a dozen of them.

】

item.title: 智利投资者转向海外市场，美联储政策与地缘政治因素推升利率
item.description: 智利固定收益投资者今年正将目光投向国内局势之外，华盛顿的决策和地缘政治热点事件正盖过新政府上台带来的影响。【原文：Chilean fixed-income investors are looking beyond domestic developments this year, with decisions in Washington and geopolitical flashpoints eclipsing the impact of a new administration at home.】

item.title: 穆迪称，到2030年数据中心将需要3万亿美元投资
item.description: 穆迪评级公司表示，未来五年内，至少3万亿美元将流入数据中心相关投资领域，这些资金将依赖信贷市场的多个领域提供支持。【原文：At least $3 trillion is set to flow into data-center-related investments over the next five years, capital that will rely on the might of multiple areas of the credit markets to provide, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 玉米价格升至两周高点，因报告显示美国产量可能减少
item.description: 玉米期货触及两周高点，交易员正等待美国农业部发布关键月度报告，该报告预计将下调美国玉米产量预期。【原文：Corn futures hit the highest in two weeks as traders await a key monthly report from the US Department of Agriculture, which is expected to pare the outlook for US corn yields.】

item.title: 花旗分析师曼西认为更多投资者正将资金分散投资于美国股市之外
item.description: 花旗集团策略师表示，投资者将在2026年继续推进其分散股票持仓的计划，推动全球基准股指再涨10%。【原文：Investors will push ahead with their desire to diversify equity holdings in 2026, driving a further 10% gain for a benchmark global stock index, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 印度通胀率维持低位，为降息留有空间
item.description: 印度12月通胀率加速上升，但仍低于印度储备银行设定的2%-6%目标区间，这为央行在2月会议上降息留下了充足空间。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated in December while remaining below the Reserve Bank of India’s target range of 2%-6%, leaving ample room for the central bank to cut interest rates at its February meet.】

item.title: 塔塔咨询服务公司利润低于预期，科技支出尚未回升
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务公司季度盈利未达分析师预期，因地缘政治紧张局势持续发酵，企业继续限制信息技术项目的支出。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.’s quarterly earnings missed analysts’ estimates, as corporations continue to limit spending on information technology projects in an era of geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 为特朗普起诉媒体的律师办公桌后方摆放着"特朗普终结者"玩偶
item.description: 在迈阿密附近一间角落办公室里，亚历杭德罗·"亚历克斯"·布里托最著名的客户仅以一尊摇头娃娃的形式存在——那尊摆在办公桌后架子上的玩偶，将唐纳德·特朗普总统塑造成科幻系列电影《终结者》的形象，身着皮夹克，戴着墨镜。【原文：The only sign of Alejandro “Alex” Brito’s most famous client in his corner office near Miami is a bobblehead doll depicting President Donald Trump as the “Terminator” from the sci-fi franchise, sporting a leather jacket and sunglasses, on a shelf behind his desk.】
